item.title: Fundementals of software architecture review
item.description: Fundementals of software architecture is a book by Mark Richards, Neal Ford. This article is mostly just a bunch of quotes collected from it. I’ll take some time to process them and update this article. When reading about architecture readers must keep in mind that, like much art, it can only be understood in context. Everything in software architecture is a trade-off.
